sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap' const AboutCard = () => { return( My name is Steven Mann, an aspiring web developer in Houston, TX, proficient in several technolgoies including: Javascript, JQuery, React, MySQl and Node.js. I have experience building, designing and styling personal websites using various languages and tools like HTML, CSS, JQuery to design fully functional web platforms. I am passionate about merging functionality with creativity in a high pressure environment. In previous work experience, I was able to utilize and merge client inventory into a proprietary application, giving the client the ability to view, order and maintain inventory. Versed in collaborative work environments to ensure optimal results for user-centered designs.

When I am not working on my career, I enjoy writing, recording and performing music across the state of Texas. I perform in several local bands and enjoy playing genres from country and americana to blues and rock. I have opened for acts such as Kyle Hollingsworth, Dumpstafunk, Naughty Professor, George Porter Jr., Organ Freeman and The Texas Gentlemen. I also enjoy outdoor activities such as biking, fishing, and camping. On my most recent camping trip, I traveled to Lost Maples just outside of San Antonio, spending four days and nights in the remote Texas hillcountry. ) } const styles = { shadow: { background: 'rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.1)', boxShadow: '0 8px 6px -6px black', borderRadius: '55px 55px 55px 55px', padding: '10px' }, body: { zindex: 1, opacity: 1 } } export default AboutCard;
